document_data.caption: A map of Tabot showing Nam Tso in the bottom left; the Marnu Cliffs lie near the eastern tributary.
document_data.name: Marnu Cliffs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Marnu Cliffs''' were a series of cliffs in the [[Po Yul Dzayul Range]] in [[Tabot]].
document_data.Geography: From the foot of the Marnu Cliffs emerged the [[Nam River]], which rushed westward to fill [[Nam Tso]]. [[Hoshki Gompa]] stood nearby.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: [[Tzu Wan]], a hermit and oracle called the Entrusted, lived above the Marnu Cliffs around {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}.
